metadata.dc:author: Villarreal-Urenda, C
Olivares-López, F
Zamalloa-Torres, V
Cano-Domínguez, C
Ruiz-Maya, L
metadata.dc:description: This prospective study was carried out on thirty patients transfused with blood or blood products, by ten (33.3%) posttransfusion hepatitis was diagnosed; this is 15.75 cases per 1,000 U transfused. Four patients developed jaundice; six remained asymptomatic. In nine patients (90%) non-A, non-B hepatitis was diagnosed and one (10%) case was classified as hepatitis B. Two patients with non-A, non-B hepatitis developed chronic hepatitis, corroborated through percutaneous liver biopsy.
metadata.dc:title: Hepatitis post transfusión. Estudio prospectivo.
[Posttransfusion hepatitis. A prospective study].
